titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of a Borrower's Card: Eleanor Hayden Kittredge

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards Name spelled differently in image file than on card, card is spelled "Kittredge" s3: Jan 30 = "wook"? s4: May 18 = "turn"? s6: Nov 16 = amount owed is crossed out s8: Oct 25= "sing"? s9: June 2 = return date not complete s10: March 7 = "Bnineton"? March 13 = "Santa"? s12: Feb 21 = "Mules + Meen"? s14: Oct 21 = "eatio"? s16: Sept 6 (Time and Tide) = not clear, note under "5v" s17: Dec 18 = blue ink, note before 3.50 unclear s19: under "Warrant for X" = crossed out, "Sevin"? April 25 = "Lucty Calson"?
